summary: A simple standalone follower mod I made.
descriptionHtml:
Hello Everyone on the nexus here. Today Preset to you my first standalone follower mod. 
the follower is from the preset by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/19720129]LordMikukiSan[/url].


Rose's location Moorside Inn in Morthal
Body is datjellyman's UUNP
texture type fair skin
Class, Farmer <=(wasn't too sure what to set her as, but i'm open to opinions here.)
Weight 100

Credits

Rose Racemenu Preset by  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/19720129]LordMikukiSan[/url]
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67064

Better Makeup for SKSE by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5373679]Diethardt[/url]
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/

Mikan Eyes by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2702882]nerune2525[/url]
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?

datjellyman's UUNP Created up Datjellyman's upload [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/19720129]LordMikukiSan[/url]
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68594

Fair Skin Complexion by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4557236]HHaleyy[/url]
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?

Would also like to give a special thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/38721495]taoxue[/url] for helping with my questions for this mod!
author: foxhound148
